1.0.0.name: wordpress/tashan
1.0.0.description: Tashan - a sleek, elegant and stylish theme built upon the underscores (_s) with a touch of Bootstrap and a Parallax (Skrollr) effect header. Tashan packs an array of theme features including custom header section, custom Recent Posts widget, Custom Recent Comments widget, a flexible Showcase widget area on the home page. With an added splash of font control for the header, content and widget headings.
